During treatment phase , eligible participant assign chance ( like toss coin ) receive either JNJ-42165279 100 mg placebo daily 4 consecutive visit clinic . The primary assessment , Blood Oxygen Level Dependent Functional Magnetic Resonance Imaging ( BOLD-fMRI ) , measure brain activity pattern participant complete 3 emotionally-provoking task . Additionally , participant ' startle response ( eye blink ) evaluate two emotionally-provoking behavioral task outside scanner . Questionnaires complete evaluate participant ' mood , blood sample collect measure concentration JNJ-42165279 biomarkers drug activity . Safety monitor throughout study , include adverse event , vital sign ( blood pressure heart rate ) , 12-lead ECGs , physical examination , clinical safety laboratory , evaluation suicidal risk , Walk Turn test .
